analysis:
Entries in art and design subjects have decreased across the UK over the last five years. The -5.7% change compared to a change of -5.8% in all A-Level entries over the last five years. Over the same period, the 18-year-old population has changed by approximately -6.7%.

Across the UK, a broadly similar proportion of students achieved the top grades in art and design subjects in 2019 as did so across all A-Level subjects. A total of 27.8% of pupils achieved A*-A grades in art and design subjects compared to 25.5% for all subjects.

Across the UK, a broadly similar proportion of students achieved the top grades in biology in 2019 as did so across all A-Level subjects. A total of 24.1% of pupils achieved A*-A grades in biology compared to 25.5% for all subjects.
